description: Establishes foundational simulation loop, tick clock, and actor event pipeline.
Implements global event dispatch, logging hooks, and debug observation layers.
Adds fog-of-war, zone-based vision, and tactical environment awareness.
Establishes core combat interactions, including targeting, damage, and initiative.
Adds skill learning, hierarchical skills, technique evolution, and mutation logic.
Transitions from text to sprite-based rendering with full UI routing.
Enables procedural quest hooks, backstory links, and dialogue systems.
